text: @JoyAnnReid @kasie Yeah, exactly - why are democrats trying to use covid19 to include completely unrelated partisan bullshit in a bill intended to address a pandemic, intentionally delaying action?  Shame on democrats, and on those who defend them for this, @JoyAnnReid
